LANGUAGE_LABEL.TOOLTIP: Change your target language in the editor.
MESSAGES.WRONG_VERSION: You are using the incorrect version of unity recommended for VRChat. This can cause unexpected behaviour, please upgrade your project or create a fresh one using the current officially supported version: {0}
MESSAGES.AVATAR_PARENT: You need to place this component inside an avatar as a child object for it to work properly.
MESSAGES.STARTUP: You can start adding emotes or folders using the buttons below. You can also drag an AnimationClip to this window to add it automatically.
SETTINGS.LABEL: Build Settings
SETTINGS.MENU_PATH.TOOLTIP: You can specify a custom menu hierarchy where this component will generate the main menu.
SETTINGS.WriteDefaultsAction.TOOLTIP: Write default options for individual layers. Change this if you want a consistent Write Defaults settings for each layer.
SETTINGS.WriteDefaultsFX.TOOLTIP: Write default options for individual layers. Change this if you want a consistent Write Defaults settings for each layer
SETTINGS.SeparateSpeedSlider.TOOLTIP: If enabled, the speed slider will be added to the main menu instead of being embedded onto each emote.
SETTINGS.ResetSpeedOnEmoteStop.TOOLTIP: If enabled, emote speed will be reset to the default fraction "25%" after the current emote stops.
SETTINGS.ResetSpeedOnCloseRadial.TOOLTIP: If enabled, emote speed will be reset upon closing the speed radial slider.
SETTINGS.RandomEmoteButton.TOOLTIP: If enabled, a button to play random emotes will be added on the main menu. Have fun!
SETTINGS.AppendFolderSize.TOOLTIP: If enabled, the total amount of emotes contained will be appended to the label of the folder.
SETTINGS.CUSTOM_AUDIO_PATH.TOOLTIP: Specify a custom audio path for a custom AudioSource under this avatar.
SETTINGS.AUDIO_PATH.TOOLTIP: The custom path that will be used, an audio source will be added automatically at upload if this field is empty.
SETTINGS.AUDIO_HELP_BOX:
[!] This tool will automatically create an audio source at upload.

[!] Set a custom path if you want the emote audio to play on a different AudioSource under the avatar.

[!] Drag & Drop an AudioSource component into the field above to automatically find and fill the audio path.
SETTINGS.CUSTOMIZE_CONTROLS.TOOLTIP: Here you can customize your icons and labels that will be displayed on your expressions menu.
SETTINGS.CONTROLS_ICON.TOOLTIP: This control's icon as displayed in the expressions menu.
SETTINGS.CONTROLS_LABEL.TOOLTIP: This control's label, is the text displayed below the icon. (Yes, you can use Rich Text)
SETTINGS.ControlMain.TOOLTIP: Main control that will appear on your expressions menu. Every other control will be contained inside a submenu under this one.
SETTINGS.ControlVolume.TOOLTIP: Control used to change the volume of the audio source used for the emotes.
SETTINGS.ControlSpeed.TOOLTIP: Control used to change the speed of the animation in real time. Requires the option "$$SETTINGS.SeparateSpeedSlider$$" to be enabled.
SETTINGS.ControlList.TOOLTIP: Control used to contain the list of your emotes.
SETTINGS.ControlSettings.TOOLTIP: Control used to store toggles and other settings.
SETTINGS.ControlSync.TOOLTIP: Control used to enable Emote Sync if at least one animation has Sync enabled.
SETTINGS.ControlSyncGlobal.TOOLTIP: Control used to switch Emote Sync to a global setting, this means that anyone can make you dance from anywhere. This is limited by avatar culling.
SETTINGS.ControlPage.TOOLTIP: Control used when there's more than 8 items in a page, this button will be generated.
SETTINGS.ControlRandom.TOOLTIP: Control used to play a random emote from your list.
SETTINGS.ControlGroup.TOOLTIP: Control used for folders and groups. This is the default look of custom folders.
SETTINGS.ControlEmote.TOOLTIP: Control used for the toggles and buttons for emotes. Default look of emote buttons.
SETTINGS.CUSTOM_PARAMETERS.TOOLTIP: Customize the parameters used on the animator in generated transitions.
SETTINGS.CUSTOM_PARAMETERS_INFO: [?] You can customize your parameters if you want to use OSC or interact with the parameters in other animators or layers.
SETTINGS.ParameterInt.TOOLTIP: (INT) Parameter used to transition to the specific emote that will be played.
SETTINGS.ParameterVolume.TOOLTIP: (FLOAT) Parameter used to drive the AudioSource volume.
SETTINGS.ParameterSpeed.TOOLTIP: (FLOAT) Parameter used to drive the animation speed in real time.
SETTINGS.ParameterSyncToggle.TOOLTIP: (BOOL) Parameter used to check toggle status for Emote Sync.
SETTINGS.ParameterSyncGlobal.TOOLTIP: (BOOL) Parameter used to check if Emote Sync should have global behaviour.
SETTINGS.ParameterSync.TOOLTIP: (BOOL) Parameter used internally to check if the avatar received a Emote Sync contact event.
SETTINGS.ParameterSpeedOpen.TOOLTIP: (BOOL) Parameter used to check if the speed radial is opened. (Option must be enabled: $$SETTINGS.ResetSpeedOnCloseRadial$$)
SETTINGS.ParameterRand.TOOLTIP: (BOOL) Parameter used to play a random emote on a toggle.
SETTINGS.ParameterPitch.TOOLTIP: (BOOL) Parameter used internally to check if the current AudioSource pitch should be affected by emote speed.
SETTINGS.EmoteSyncTag.TOOLTIP: The tag used to trigger sync emotes with other players
FOLDER.LABEL: Folder Label
FOLDER.LABEL.TOOLTIP: Text label that will be displayed in the expressions menu.
FOLDER.ICON.TOOLTIP: Icon override to display in the menu entry for this folder.
STATE.NO_MOTIONS_ERROR: No motions assigned to this state. Assign an AnimationClip or BlendTree to the motion property.
STATE.NO_LOOP_WARNING: Warning, animation clip does not Loop. This motion will only play a single cycle.
STATE.MOTION.TOOLTIP: Animation that will be played for this emote in the action controller.
STATE.MOTION_SPEED.TOOLTIP: Base animation speed, will be affected by the radial slider.
STATE.MOTION_EXIT_TIME.TOOLTIP: Normalized animation exit time. (0 equals the start of the animation, 1 is the end of the animation, 2 means loops twice, etc...)
STATE.MOTION_IS_ENTRY.TOOLTIP: Marks this motion as entry motion, this will make this motion only play once on start.
STATE.MOTION_IS_EXIT.TOOLTIP: Marks this motion as exit motion, this will make this motion play once the emote is stopped.
STATE.MOTION_AUDIO.TOOLTIP: Audio to play when playing this entry/exit motion.
STATE.MOTION_AUDIO_LOOP.TOOLTIP: Audio will loop while the motion is active.
STATE.MOTION_TRANSITION_DUR.TOOLTIP: Duration of the transition blending to the next motion, in seconds.
STATE.OPTIONS_FREEZE.TOOLTIP: Freeze the player's movement while this emote is active.
STATE.OPTIONS_IK.TOOLTIP: Use IK for this animation state.
STATE.OPTIONS_SYNC.TOOLTIP: This animation will be synched with others wearing the avatar nearby.
STATE.LABEL: Label
STATE.LABEL.TOOLTIP: Text label that will be displayed in the expressions menu.
STATE.ICON.TOOLTIP: Icon override to display in the menu entry for this emote.
STATE.CONTROL_TYPE.TOOLTIP:
Sets the control type used on the button for this emote.

$$STATE.CONTROL_TYPE.0$$: $$STATE.CONTROL_TYPE.0.TOOLTIP$$

$$STATE.CONTROL_TYPE.1$$: $$STATE.CONTROL_TYPE.1.TOOLTIP$$

$$STATE.CONTROL_TYPE.2$$: $$STATE.CONTROL_TYPE.2.TOOLTIP$$

$$STATE.CONTROL_TYPE.3$$: $$STATE.CONTROL_TYPE.3.TOOLTIP$$
STATE.CONTROL_TYPE.0.TOOLTIP: Creates a radial with motion speed modifier.
STATE.CONTROL_TYPE.1.TOOLTIP: Simple toggle without motion speed modifier.
STATE.CONTROL_TYPE.2.TOOLTIP: Motion will play while button is held down.
STATE.CONTROL_TYPE.3.TOOLTIP: Toggle plays the animation once and stops after the first play.
STATE.CHANGE_PITCH.TOOLTIP: Determines if animation speed using radial should affect the Audio pitch.
STATE.SPEED_MULTIPLIER.TOOLTIP: Used for the radial to multiply the speed by this value. A higher value means faster at 100%. Fraction will be the default playback speed when the emote starts.
STATE.DECIMATE_KEYFRAMES.TOOLTIP: Creates a copy of this animation with reduced keyframes for fun. (This does not optimize your animations, is just a fun feature.)
STATE.CONSTANT_TANGENTS.TOOLTIP: Sets left and right keyframe tangents to Constant for a more choppy effect.
STATE.KEYFRAME_FPS.TOOLTIP: Frames Per Seconds for the decimated animation.
STATE.RAND_TIME_OFFSET.TOOLTIP: Randomly offsets the resulting keyframe's time by this value for a more destructive result. Recommended values are between 0 and 0.1
STATE.ENABLE_OBJECTS.TOOLTIP: Objects to enable when this emote is played.
STATE.PLAY_AUDIO.TOOLTIP: Enables audio playback for this emote state.
STATE.AUDIO_CUSTOM_PATH_MSG: Define a custom path if you want the audio for this emote to play on a different AudioSource under this avatar's hierarchy.
STATE.AUDIO_INFO_MSG: These are the configurations that will be applied to the generated VRCAnimatorPlayAudio component on this state.
STATE.AUDIO_PLAYBACK_ORDER.TOOLTIP: The playback order for the AudioClip array when it enters the state.
STATE.AUDIO_CLIPS.TOOLTIP: Contains the AudioClips to be played.
STATE.AUDIO_PARAMETER_MSG: Select an 'Int' avatar parameter below. The value of this parameter will determine which clip is selected.
STATE.AUDIO_PARAMETER_NAME.TOOLTIP: The name of the 'Int' parameter to be used.
STATE.AUDIO_FILTERS.TOOLTIP: You can add audio filters to this AudioClip, these will be applied automatically when uploading.
STATE.AUDIO_FILTERS_WARN: One or more AudioClips in this state has "Preload Audio Data" set to false. Filters will not be applied to these audio files.
STATE.AUDIO_SETTINGS.TOOLTIP: Properties applied to the AudioSource when entering this state.
STATE.AUDIO_LOOP.TOOLTIP: If enabled, AudioClip will loop for the duration of this state.
STATE.TRANSITIONS.TOOLTIP: Extra custom conditions that can trigger this emote state.
STATE.TRANSITION_CONDITIONS.TOOLTIP: Will trigger this emote when all these conditions are met.
STATE.TRANSITION_STOP_ON_FALSE.TOOLTIP: The emote will stop automatically if the condition returns to false.
